"Ilma tells <%me> his thoughts on Central City and Lost Central. The two cities have similar layouts and structures, not to mention the Central Cannon at the heart of each. It's possible that the two cities were designed by \"someone\" entirely unlike the people living on Halpha today. He intends to investigate who those beings might have been."
